title: Display Card, "Planting Time", 1942
description: Upright rectangular card covered in a green felt and cut out of leaf with straw-like material.  A green border is along the edge of the board.  24 buttons varied in pink and yellow are attached to the board; 8 buttons are flowered pots, 8 buttons are shovels with flowers, and 8 buttons are wheel barrels with flowers. printed on top left corner is La Mode [logo]; printed in center of leaf "Planting Time"/ "by Marion Weeber".

tombstone.epitaph:
Display Card, "Planting Time", 1942.
1942. Cardboard, Felt. Bequest of Marion Weeber Welsh. 2006-2-71.
